languages.text: "В день, когда языкастый голодранец подохнет, я с чистым сердцем подниму рог с восхвалением Всеотцу. Но паршивый ксенос — наш пусть и убогонький, но трофей. Отдавать его без боя этой говорящей мочалке — постыдно".

"With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."
languages.original_text: "В день, когда языкастый голодранец подохнет, я с чистым сердцем подниму рог с восхвалением Всеотцу. Но паршивый ксенос — наш пусть и убогонький, но трофей. Отдавать его без боя этой говорящей мочалке — постыдно".

traits.locale_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「この毒舌野郎が死ぬ日には、全知の父を称えて俺は心から角笛を掲げよう。卑劣な異種族ではちっぽけな戦利品かもしれんが、奴は俺たちの戦利品なんだ。このおしゃべりなモップと戦わずして差し出すなんて恥だぞ」
languages.original_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."

traits.locale_text: 「この毒舌野郎が死ぬ日には、全知の父を称えて俺は心から角笛を掲げよう。卑劣な異種族ではちっぽけな戦利品かもしれんが、奴は俺たちの戦利品なんだ。このおしゃべりなモップと戦わずして差し出すなんて恥だぞ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “等到这个尖酸刻薄的异形人渣被消灭的那天，我将以无比纯洁的虔诚举起手中的角杯，赞美伟大的全父。不过，虽然这个肮脏的异形只是个微不足道的战利品，但依然是我们的战利品。如果任由这个会说话的拖把头夺走战利品，是战士的耻辱。”
languages.original_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."

traits.locale_text: “等到这个尖酸刻薄的异形人渣被消灭的那天，我将以无比纯洁的虔诚举起手中的角杯，赞美伟大的全父。不过，虽然这个肮脏的异形只是个微不足道的战利品，但依然是我们的战利品。如果任由这个会说话的拖把头夺走战利品，是战士的耻辱。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « C'est avec un cœur pur que je lèverai ma corne en l'honneur du Père de Tous le jour où cette langue de vipère rendra son dernier soupir. L'ignoble xénos n'est peut-être qu'un piteux trophée, mais c'est notre trophée. Le livrer à cette serpillière ambulante sans combattre serait une honte. »
languages.original_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."

traits.locale_text: « C'est avec un cœur pur que je lèverai ma corne en l'honneur du Père de Tous le jour où cette langue de vipère rendra son dernier soupir. L'ignoble xénos n'est peut-être qu'un piteux trophée, mais c'est notre trophée. Le livrer à cette serpillière ambulante sans combattre serait une honte. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Con pureza en el corazón, alzaré mi cuerno en alabanza al Padre de todas las cosas cuando muera esta escoria de lengua afilada. Ese xenos mugriento será un trofeo de lo más insólito, pero no deja de ser un trofeo. Entregarlo sin oponer resistencia a esta sabandija parlanchina sería motivo de escarnio».
languages.original_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."

traits.locale_text: «Con pureza en el corazón, alzaré mi cuerno en alabanza al Padre de todas las cosas cuando muera esta escoria de lengua afilada. Ese xenos mugriento será un trofeo de lo más insólito, pero no deja de ser un trofeo. Entregarlo sin oponer resistencia a esta sabandija parlanchina sería motivo de escarnio».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Mit reinem Herzen werde ich mein Horn zu Ehren des Allvaters erheben, wenn dieser scharfzüngige Abschaum endlich stirbt. Der stinkende Xenos war eine lausige Trophäe, aber immerhin eine Trophäe. Ihn kampflos diesem sprechenden Mop zu überlassen, ist beschämend."
languages.original_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."

traits.locale_text: "Mit reinem Herzen werde ich mein Horn zu Ehren des Allvaters erheben, wenn dieser scharfzüngige Abschaum endlich stirbt. Der stinkende Xenos war eine lausige Trophäe, aber immerhin eine Trophäe. Ihn kampflos diesem sprechenden Mop zu überlassen, ist beschämend."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bu çatal dilli pisliğin öldüğü gün, boynuzumu saf bir yürekle Yücebaba'nın onuruna kaldıracağım. Zeno iti, değersiz bir av ganimeti olabilir. Yine de o bizim ganimetimiz. Savaşmadan bu konuşan paspasa teslim edersek rezil kepaze oluruz."
languages.original_text: "With a pure heart, I will raise my horn in praise to the Allfather on the day that this sharp-tongued scum dies. The foul xenos may be a meagre trophy, but he is still our trophy. Giving him up without a fight to this talking mop is shameful."

traits.locale_text: "Bu çatal dilli pisliğin öldüğü gün, boynuzumu saf bir yürekle Yücebaba'nın onuruna kaldıracağım. Zeno pisliği değersiz bir av ganimeti olabilir ama yine de o bizim ganimetimiz. Onu savaşmadan bu konuşan paspasa teslim etmek bir utanç kaynağı olur."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
